thread.title: And the Sloth Kong Airport Photo Contest winner for July is...
thread.title_full: And the Sloth Kong Airport Photo Contest winner for July is...

author: Jill Replogle
title: And the Sloth Kong Airport Photo Contest winner for July is...
text:
And the Sloth Kong Airport Photo Contest winner for July is... The Tico Times To: Haimeluna/The Tico Times 
Karin Cook Hass and Co.! Congratulations for winning our July photo contest. On behalf of Karin and her travel partners, we’ll donate $100 to Hogar Sol for needy children in Costa Rica. 
The contest rules are simple: Take your photo with Sloth Kong at Juan Santamaría International Airport before boarding your flight back home, share it with us on Facebook , Instagram or Twitter or email it to sk@ticotimes.net . Be sure to include the hashtag ‪#‎ SlothKong‬ . Check out our tagboard here: www.ticotimes.net/skcontest/ . 
Every month, we’ll choose the most creative photo and donate $100 on behalf of the winner to the institution Hogar Sol. 
Congratulations Karin!
